name: Heracross
flavorText:
It is usually docile, but if it is
disturbed while sipping honey,
it chases off the intruder with its horn.

previous.name: Shuckle
previous.flavorText:
The BERRIES it
stores in its
vase-like shell decompose and
become a gooey
liquid.

next.name: Sneasel
next.flavorText:
Its paws conceal
sharp claws. If
attacked, it sud­ denly extends the
claws and startles
its enemy.
